### Events
- Core PCE hot, rate expectations repriced, base rate impact on borrower coverage worsens

### Notes
- PCE data means base rates stay high longer. Borrowers sub-1x DSCR at 14, nearly triple month-start. Revolver draw rate 56.3%. Amendment backlog clearing but new requests still incoming. Recovery rate estimate at 65.2%.
